Hey max hows tricks mate? if u wanna add a cover just click the bayimg link below tags on the upload page its a direct link to bayimg then upload ur cover/picture there add anything for a removal code then in settings be sure to resize to torrent image then upload it. copy the numbers and paste them in the open spot on the upload page here at TPB where it says image tags will be 9 letters some have numbers (HajFKaaEA)  hope this helps mate:)
